Outstanding in many ways. The characters are multi-dimensional and likable. As just one example, the Joost Smoss character in "Mimosa" is not threatened by being mis-identified as gay (and what an original idea for advancing the story!). Later, he has no problem receiving and acting upon the feedback provided by his partner (Liandra Dahl), nor is she at all hesitant in making her request. As a personal aside, I appreciated the availability of English subtitles (even though that's the language being spoken), as I am hearing-impaired. Subtitles for the interviews would have been nice.

The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because I didn't like the masturbation short. As you've read it's three different stories: two women, a female masturbation, and male/female. I really enjoyed the female/female story. Not stereotypical porn aimed at men. It was two women realistically being together and enjoying each other. It's not written or shot with men in mind. Loved it. This was exactly what I was looking for. I'm writing this review because it was the review I was looking for that I didn't find. If you're the type that thinks lesbian means two women solely for a man's pleasure, you won't be into this story. No plastic, fake women being shot with the stereotypical stuff aimed at male audiences. Realistic looking women realistically enjoying each other's bodies. The female masturbation story wasn't my thing. I was hoping for more from the third story but no complaints otherwise. This gets 5 stars for the first story alone for me. I'm very interested in seeing what else this director has done.

So I bought this not knowing 100% what I was getting into other than an adult artsy film.  Well first off, I will say it isn't bad.  Yes its explicit, but not as explicit as I was expecting, but I guess that's where the artsy part comes in at.  I've only seen 2 of the shorts so far, wanted to wait until I saw all 3, but I don't know when ill have time again to kick it on anytime soon.  The too I saw, "Housesitter"  and "Mimosa" were the 2 I saw.  Housesitter was the reason I wanted this movie, however, the story on both of them, fairly odd, but not too bad.  I like housesitter a lot better than the Mimosa one though.

What I got out of the story is anyone who sees or comes into contact with the Silver shoes (housesitter in the closest and mimosa the girl wore them) they become horny and don't care what they do.  Which was fine by me lol.  But the Housesitter description was stating that she see's something in the library that gets her excited.  Well watching it, im guessing she saw something but as to what, I have no idea, all of a sudden she stands up and hugs the book shelf and then rummages through the closet to find the shoes and have fun.

However, I feel that description is wrong, from what I got out of it, the lady is obsessed with the owner (man) of the house, even if we don't see him, she obviously just wants to touch everything and anything of his.  When she goes through his closest, she puts the shoes on, grabs his suit jacket, wraps herself in it as if he was embracing her, then does the deed on top of the jacket, then it ends.

Pretty good if I may add, but not the way the description portrayed it.  So maybe when I finally see the last one ill add to this, but for the time being I enjoyed this show, not too bad.  A little odd, not a complete smut porn, more classy which is good, and the housesitter did an amazing job ;)

I like Annabelle Lee and think she's really pretty.  She's the girl on the DVD boxcover.  Annabelle also makes for a very believable submissive young woman that a more dominant lesbian dressed in masculine attire might be attracted to, which is pretty much what this first scene is all about.  If there's a problem, it's the the director/writer kind of rushes it.  I mean, instead of a seduction, complete with pursuit & capture, the two women just kind of broach the issue of sex and then begin going at it.  Still, I enjoyed it, but felt that with a little more effort it could all have been so much hotter!
